title: Identify this font for my work please!
content:
So this company I just started at has lost the file for their logo and has asked me to help recreate it. Thing is, nobody has any idea what font was used in the logo. I was hoping you guys could help me out. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IT4E\_Logo2.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824121828/http:/typophile.com/files/IT4E_Logo2.gif) | 4.61 KB |
author: hickmanc

comments.content: Thank you!! More brownie points for me. This place is awesome.
